PerfectNetExp.abs: 辅币单位是生丁(centime),1瑞士法郎等于100生丁。流通的纸币面额有5、10、20、50、100、1000瑞士法郎;硬币面额有5、10、20生 …

list.abs: Cent(一分[仙])、Satang(泰国辅币),及Centime(法辅币生丁)、Centimes(海地辅币)、Centimo(西班牙辅币、哥斯大黎加辅币)、Centimos(巴拉圭辅币)、Cen-tavo(菲律宾.

derivation.yuyuan_name: French, from Latin centesimus 'hundredth', from centum 'a hundred'

means.word_mean: 1. a fractional monetary unit of several countries: France and Algeria and Belgium and Burkina Faso and Burundi and Cameroon and Chad and the Congo and Gabon and Haiti and the Ivory Coast and Luxembourg and Mali and Morocco and Niger and Rwanda and Senegal
2. a coin worth one-hundredth of the value of the basic unit
